---
category: news
title: "Words prove their worth as teaching tools for robots"
excerpt: "What is the best way to teach a robot? Sometimes it may simply be to speak to it clearly. Researchers found that human-language descriptions of tools can accelerate the learning of a simulated robotic arm lifting and using a variety of tools."
